title: M-Tron Expansion Packs - Streetly Tapes vol 1 and 2, ChamberTron
description: Greetings, tron lovers! We've got a banquet for you today! Here is the complete (as of this writing) set of M-Tron expansion packs! Included are both Streetly Tapes sound banks, for those classic Tron sounds with that vintage feel painstakingly recreated; ChamberTron, for the higher-fidelity Chamberlin sounds; OptiTron, for Optigan; and OrchesTron, for the instrument of the same name. Is this the last word in Mellotron sampling? Don't you believe it! But you may find this becomes your go-to Mellotron source for days to come.
